description: How do we build hope and trust in the future when we cannot count on one of the key promises of Nordic societies: the promise that the economy will grow and make the lives of people better?
extendedDescription:
All developed societies are undergoing major transformations. Ageing population, digital disruptions, political segregation, climate and resource shocks highlight that we are living in volatile times and economic growth no longer equates to progress as it did in the industrial era. 

The NextEra global conversation arrives to Sweden. 

NextEra has had similar meet-ups in San Francisco, London and Tokyo already, and these have resulted in living nodes in the network. The work results in an operational network and book to be published at the end of the year.
